text: The Verein für Leibesübungen Bochum 1848 (VfL Bochum) is a football and sports club in Bochum, Germany. Besides football, the VfL Bochum operates the following kinds of sport: Badminton, Basketball, Fencing, Ice hockey, athletics, Handball, Swimming, dance sport, Tennis, Table tennis and Volleyball. Category:Bochum Category:Fußball-Bundesliga Category:Football clubs in North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Sports clubs in Germany
title: VfL Bochum
